texto: attributes or distinguishing features that pertain to a measurable description of a product or service 3.1.20 enabling system system that supports a system‐of‐interest during its life cycle stages but does not necessarily contribute directly to its function during operation EXAMPLE A configuration management system used to control software elements during software development. Note 1 to entry: Each enabling system has a life cycle of its own. This document is applicable to each enabling system when, in its own right, it is treated as a system‐of‐interest. 3.1.21 environment <system> context determining the setting and circumstances of all influences upon a system [SOURCE: ISO/IEC/IEEE
